Address.value: 3505 WEST SAM HOUSTON PARKWAY NORTH,SUITE 300, HOUSTON, Texas, 77043, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Battalion Oil Corp is an independent oil and gas producer operating exclusively in the Delaware Basin. It is an independent energy company focused on the acquisition, production, exploration, and development of onshore liquids-rich oil and natural gas assets in the United States. The company operates in one segment which focuses on oil and natural gas acquisition, production, exploration, and development.

value.name: Daniel P. Rohling
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
